name: Slither Slope
description:
Snake and Snake were enjoying a lovely picnic together, when suddenly an eagle swooped down and snatched Snake away to its nest! Play as Snake, and race through the forest down to the eagle's nest to rescue your paramour, Snake.

Slither Slope is a 3D physics based platformer where you must navigate a  downhill slope. Zip through hollow logs, juke past angry avians, and bounce across rocks as you race to the eagle's nest to rescue Snake before he is eaten.

(For stability and quality, downloading the game is recommended, but there is a web player version available for your convenience).
Use WASD to control Snake, the scroll wheel to zoom in and out,  and the escape key to pause the game.
